name: Fish In Danger - Undersea
description:
* Hello, my friend! My name is Ruby and I live in the mystic ocean Caaol. *
** My ocean is in danger, and I need your help! Save my home as soon as possible. **
*** All the underwater world relies on you! ***

My fish friends are sharpened inside the bubbles. Get us out of these bubbles and let us go back to our families and friends.

How to play
• Tap the bubble and save the fish
• For the tap fish, you will get 5-point bonus
• and for the missing bubble your bonus will decrease

Fish in danger — Undersea features:

• great game for the kids
• 3 different kinds of fish
• it's a great way to develop a reaction
• colorful and cute marine animals
• different levels of difficulty
• positive and friendly design
• several backgrounds for various difficulty levels
• saturated sounds and ocean atmosphere.
